explains: adj. 有事业心的，有进取心的；有魄力的，有胆量的
wordGroup: enterprising spirit 进取心，进取精神；创业精神

sentences.en: What would this energetic, enterprising country be without new lands to conquer?
sentences.cn: 如果没有新的大陆可以征服，这个充满活力和进取精神的国家会是什么样子？

sentences.en: To realize this vision, Ricci is mounting one of the most lavish, enterprising—and expensive—promotional campaigns in magazine-publishing history.
sentences.cn: 为了实现这一愿景，利玛窦正在进行杂志出版史上最奢华、最进取、最昂贵的促销活动之一。

sentences.en: He is upright, optimistic, active and enterprising, striving for truthfulness, kindness and beauty, and seeking for an ideal society all his life.
sentences.cn: 他为人正直，乐观向上，积极进取，一生追求真善美，追求理想社会。
